description:
Protect your investment. This combo from Hiplok pairs their strongest D lock, the DX, with a hardened steel chain, so you can secure your bike nearly anywhere. The DX D lock is constructed from hardened steel and has a compact design to ward off leverage attacks. The chain is loop-able, making it great option for helping to keep e-bikes and larger cargo bikes secure.

  • 14mm hardened steel shackle and hardened steel body are tough and durable
  • 10mm hardened steel links
  • Chain features larger end links to loop the chain back on itself, great for securing wheels and other removable components
  • Chain is wrapped in tube webbing to help protect your bike’s finish
  • Dual locking, anti-twist shackle tabs for the ultimate protection
  • Integrated clip on the D lock makes it easy to carry the lock on your belt or pack straps
  • Durable case is made of impact-resistant nylon
  • Weatherproof keyhole seal keeps the grime out of the locking mechanism
  • 3 keys are included. These are coded and can be replaced if you lose them
  • Dimensions inside the lock are 15cm x 8.5cm
name: Hiplok E-DX Chain  & U-Lock Combo
